issue.title: [CF 1440] Issue maybe? Track missing debuffs on enemy with one icon (druid)
issue.body:
Goal: Show the non-applied spell icon in order when target is missing that particular debubb/dot, in Order

 

What I'm trying to do:

-Create "missing buff/debuff" group

-what to track: Rake; Trash; Moonfire; Rip

-who to watch: target

-Debuff checkbox selected

-Only cast by me selected

-Duration requirement: minimum 0:01

-Opacity and colod: Duration < 1 hidden, Any abscent: 100%, All applied: hidden

 

Problem: Any one of the debuff is applied, the button turns to hidden. Also when I applied Moonfire for some reason moonfire icon shows on the icon.

 

Sorry if I'm missing something, can't seem to find any help in guides and videos, checked a lot, searched on goole. But I think the behaviour is not working properly, if I'm doing it right.

 

Thanks for helping in advance.


> Posted by CurseForge user H0PE | Imported from CurseForge issue #1440 | Raw

comments.body:
Anyone could confirm if this is an issue or I'm screwing something up please?


> Posted by CurseForge user H0PE

If you read the tooltip, you'll find out that that's not what the Missing Buffs/Debuffs icon type is for.

 

If there's lots of debuffs that you care about, and each one has individual significance (i.e. its not a case where they are all the same effect and you  just need one of them), then you need a different icon for each one. You can then combine them into a meta icon if you desire them to all be displayed in one spot.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
